claim_judgments.claim_text: *Acute Right Medial Meniscus Sprain/Strain:** Based on the patient's reported mechanism of injury (twisting fall), subjective complaint of medial knee pain, and objective findings of medial joint line tenderness and pain with valgus stress on exam, in conjunction with normal findings on X-ray (ruling out fracture/dislocation), the most likely diagnosis is an acute sprain or strain of the medial meniscus.
